events.name: Lithium-ion battery recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow.

events.name: energy options
events.wd_description: The energy options used in refining, such as wind or solar, influence the life cycle impacts, with wind generation showing lower impacts than solar.
events.description: The energy options used in refining, such as wind or solar, influence the life cycle impacts, with wind generation showing lower impacts than solar.

events.name: Refining Locations and Their Impact on GWP
events.description: Refining locations (inside or outside China) and their effect on global warming potential (GWP).

events.name: refinery locations
events.wd_description: The location of refineries can affect the environmental impacts, with refining outside of China showing a reduction in global warming potential.
events.description: The location of refineries can affect the environmental impacts, with refining outside of China showing a reduction in global warming potential.

events.name: Energy Options for Refining
events.description: The use of wind and solar energy options in refining processes and their environmental impacts.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
